column5: For anyone from the Callander Bay area, I would love to receive some clarity on the Wasi Falls area fish sanctuary and clarity if it opens up after the fist Saturday in June.  It is my understanding that the area from Wasi Falls to the point beside the Yacht club is a Sanctuary until the first Saturday in June.  For anyone who knows that area, am I correct?  Can one fish this area after the first Saturday in June?  Thanks
Yes you can fish this area from June 1 - Sept. 30.  Good Luck and I may see you out there this year...  Will
